mapper.select:
SELECT count(tbi.crimid) FROM TBPRISONER_BASEINFO tbi, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME tbc, (select * from TBYZ_CHECK_FOR_WORK where YEARDATE = #{yeardate} ) w WHERE tbi.crimid=tbc.crimid and tbi.crimid=w.crimid(+) and tbc.DETAINSTATUS='在押'
and (tbi.crimid like '%'||#{key}||'%' or tbi.name like '%'||#{key}||'%' or tbi.NAMEPINYINSHORT like UPPER('%'||#{key}||'%') )
and exists( select 'x' from tbflow_org_org og where og.orgid=#{orgid} and og.dorgid=tbc.orgid2 )

SELECT b.crimid,b.name,a.* FROM TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME c, TBPRISONER_BASEINFO b, (SELECT * FROM TBYZ_CHECK_FOR_WORK WHERE yeardate = #{yeardate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a WHERE b.crimid= a.crimid(+) and b.crimid=c.crimid and c.DETAINSTATUS = '在押' and exists( select 'x' from tbflow_org_org og where og.orgid=#{orgid} and og.dorgid=c.orgid2 ) order by b.crimid

update TBYZ_CHECK_FOR_WORK
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BASICSCORE = #{basicscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ZHJFSCORE = #{zhjfscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
LDGZSCORE = #{ldgzscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
XZJFSCORE = #{xzjfscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
XZKFSCORE = #{xzkfscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
KHSCORE = #{khscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},
CCJFSCORE = #{ccjfscore,jdbcType=FLOAT},

WORKDAYNUM = #{workdaynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

TEXT2 = #{text2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXT3 = #{text3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXT4 = #{text4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

INT2 = #{int2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where CRIMID = #{crimid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and YEARDATE = #{yeardate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and departid = #{departid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
